name: databricks-mlops
description: Comprehensive Databricks MLOps toolkit for production ML workflows. Includes 10 commands for model training/deployment, 8 specialized agents for ML best practices, 4 skills for MLOps patterns, and 2 MCP servers for MLflow/Feature Store integration. Build production-grade ML pipelines with experiment tracking, model registry, feature engineering, and monitoring.

commands.name: train-model
commands.description: Train ML model with MLflow experiment tracking and auto-logging

commands.name: register-model
commands.description: Register trained model to MLflow Model Registry with versioning

commands.name: deploy-model
commands.description: Deploy model to Databricks Model Serving endpoints

commands.name: create-feature-table
commands.description: Create Feature Store table with online/offline support

commands.name: setup-monitoring
commands.description: Set up model drift detection and performance monitoring

commands.name: run-hyperparameter-tuning
commands.description: Hyperparameter optimization with Hyperopt and parallel trials

commands.name: create-ml-pipeline
commands.description: Create end-to-end ML pipeline with orchestration

commands.name: validate-model
commands.description: Model validation, testing, and performance benchmarking

commands.name: batch-inference
commands.description: Run batch inference jobs with feature lookup and monitoring

agents.name: mlflow-expert
agents.description: MLflow experiment tracking, model registry, and best practices

agents.name: feature-store-specialist
agents.description: Feature Store design patterns and online/offline serving

agents.name: model-monitoring-expert
agents.description: Model drift detection, data quality, and alerting

agents.name: hyperparameter-optimizer
agents.description: Hyperparameter tuning strategies and distributed optimization

agents.name: ml-pipeline-architect
agents.description: End-to-end ML pipeline design and orchestration

agents.name: model-serving-specialist
agents.description: Model deployment patterns, scaling, and performance

agents.name: ml-security-guardian
agents.description: ML security, model governance, and compliance

agents.name: automl-expert
agents.description: AutoML patterns and Databricks AutoML integration

skills.name: mlflow-tracking
skills.description: MLflow experiment tracking patterns and auto-logging

skills.name: feature-engineering
skills.description: Feature Store usage patterns and feature pipelines

skills.name: model-serving
skills.description: Model deployment strategies and serving patterns

skills.name: ml-monitoring
skills.description: Model drift detection and performance monitoring

mcp_servers.name: feature-store
mcp_servers.description: Feature Store metadata and lineage access

templates.name: ml-pipeline-project
templates.description: Complete MLOps project with training, serving, and monitoring

templates.name: feature-store-pipeline
templates.description: Feature Store pipeline with online/offline serving
